Game.Description: The fifth installment in Bethesda's Elder Scrolls franchise is set in the eponymous province of Skyrim, where the ancient threat of dragons, led by the sinister Alduin, is rising again to threaten all mortal races. Only the player, as the prophesied hero the Dovahkiin, can save the world from destruction.
Game.Platforms: Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 Xbox 360 Games Store, PC Xbox One, PlayStation 4 Nintendo Switch
Game.Developers: Bethesda Game Studios, Iron Galaxy Studios
